ModMetaData.name: Gastroliths
ModMetaData.author: AliceTries
ModMetaData.description:
Make nature a little more realistic with Gastroliths (Stomach Stones),
Read more about Gastroliths - http://www.ucmp.berkeley.edu/taxa/verts/archosaurs/gastroliths.php
How this works: Patch with harmony GenReceipe add post to ButcherProducts to give back the Gastroliths as well.
Butcher an extra dice role; this time for if Gastroliths.
Roll 1d20: 1-10 Hay, 10-15 Chunks, 16 - Component, 17- Plastisteel, 18- Silver, 19-Gold, 20-Steel
----
Mod to Request: " Cyber ★ at 7:04 AM EST 9/12/2018 Mod that adds a chance for butchering animals to produce a gastrolith with potentially rare ores inside Like...you butcher a chicken, and it has a single piece of plasteel in it’s stomach "
----
The mod utilizes Pardeike's "Harmony Patch Library." (No additional download is required, as the library is included with the mod.)
